Package com.composum.pages.commons.service

Interface SiteManager

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ContentManager<Site>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    PagesSiteManager
    public interface SiteManager
extends ContentManager<Site>

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface Description
      static class  SiteManager.UniqueSiteList
      A list of Sites with unique names to collect all templates available in the resolvers search paths.

      • getContainingSiteResource

        org.apache.sling.api.resource.Resource getContainingSiteResource​(org.apache.sling.api.resource.Resource resource)
        Determines the resource of the containing site of any resource
        Parameters:
        resource - the resource which containing site is searched
        Returns:
        the resource of the site if found; maybe >null< if no parent resource represents a site

      • getSitesRoot

        org.apache.sling.api.resource.Resource getSitesRoot​(@Nonnull
                                                    com.composum.sling.core.BeanContext context,
                                                    @Nullable
                                                    String tenantId)
        Returns the sites root resource to place new sites for a specific tenant.
        Parameters:
        context - the current request context
        tenantId - the id of the tenant to use; maybe >null< if tenants are not known
        Returns:
        the root resource to create site child resources

      • getSites

Collection<Site> getSites​(@Nonnull
                          com.composum.sling.core.BeanContext context)
        Determines all sites of a specific tenant.
        Parameters:
        context - the current request context
        Returns:
        the collection of all sites available for the user

      • getSites

Collection<Site> getSites​(@Nonnull
                          com.composum.sling.core.BeanContext context,
                          @Nullable

      • getSiteTemplates

        Collection<Site> getSiteTemplates​(@Nonnull
                                  com.composum.sling.core.BeanContext context,
                                  @Nullable
                                  String tenant)
        Determines all usable site templates in the context of a specific tenant. This implementation uses the resolvers search path to find all site resources in a tenants application context. Overlayed site resources are not in the result.
        Parameters:
        context - the current request context
        tenant - the tenants name (key); maybe >null< if tenants are not known
        Returns:
        the collection of all site templates found (not >null<)
